info.title: Universal SOP Architect
info.description: 专家经验数字化编译平台 - 将业务专家的直觉与流程编译为 AI 可执行的协议

get.description:
List all workflows with pagination.

- **page**: Page number (default: 1)
- **page_size**: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)

post.description:
Create a new workflow.

- **name**: Workflow name (required)
- **description**: Workflow description (optional)
- **cover_image_url**: Cover image URL (optional)
- **status**: Workflow status, 'draft' or 'deployed' (default: 'draft')

get.description:
Get a workflow by ID.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow

put.description:
Update a workflow.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow
- **name**: New workflow name (optional)
- **description**: New description (optional)
- **cover_image_url**: New cover image URL (optional)
- **status**: New status (optional)

delete.description:
Delete a workflow.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow

get.description:
List all steps for a workflow.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow
- **page**: Page number (default: 1)
- **page_size**: Number of items per page (default: 100, max: 100)

schema.title: Response List Steps Api Workflows  Workflow Id  Steps Get

post.description:
Create a new step in a workflow.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow
- **auto_order**: If true, automatically assign step_order (append to end)
- **name**: Step name (required)
- **step_order**: Step order (required if auto_order is false)
- **status**: Step status, 'pending' or 'completed' (default: 'pending')

get.description:
Get a step by ID.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow
- **step_id**: UUID of the step

put.description:
Update a step.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow
- **step_id**: UUID of the step
- All fields are optional for partial updates

delete.description:
Delete a step.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow
- **step_id**: UUID of the step

Note: Remaining steps will be automatically reordered.

post.description:
Add a routing branch to a step.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow
- **step_id**: UUID of the step
- **condition_result**: Condition result (e.g., 'FAIL', 'UNSTABLE')
- **action_type**: Action type (e.g., 'REJECT', 'ESCALATE')
- **next_step_id**: Next step ID or 'end_process'

delete.description:
Remove a routing branch from a step.

- **workflow_id**: UUID of the workflow
- **step_id**: UUID of the step
- **branch_id**: UUID of the branch to remove

get.description:
List all examples for a step.

- **step_id**: UUID of the step
- **label**: Optional filter by label (PASS or FAIL)

schema.title: Response List Examples Api Steps  Step Id  Examples Get

post.description:
Create a new example for a step.

- **step_id**: UUID of the step
- **content**: Example content (URL for image, text for text)
- **content_type**: Content type ('image' or 'text')
- **label**: Label ('PASS' or 'FAIL') - determines which upload zone
- **description**: Optional description

Note: The label determines whether this is a passing or failing example.
Examples uploaded to the passing zone should have label='PASS',
and examples uploaded to the failing zone should have label='FAIL'.

get.description:
Get an example by ID.

- **example_id**: UUID of the example

put.description:
Update an example.

- **example_id**: UUID of the example
- All fields are optional for partial updates

delete.description:
Delete an example.

- **example_id**: UUID of the example

get.description: Generate Protocol JSON from a workflow for Agent engine consumption.

post.description: Upload an image file. Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, BMP. Max size: 10MB.

delete.description: Delete a previously uploaded file by its URL.

ProtocolInputSpec.title: ProtocolInputSpec
ProtocolInputSpec.description: Input specification for a protocol step.

ProtocolLogicConfig.title: ProtocolLogicConfig
ProtocolLogicConfig.description: Logic configuration for a protocol step.

ProtocolOutputSchema.title: ProtocolOutputSchema
ProtocolOutputSchema.description: Output schema for a protocol step.

ProtocolRoutingMap.title: ProtocolRoutingMap
ProtocolRoutingMap.description: Routing map for a protocol step.

WorkflowListResponse.title: WorkflowListResponse
WorkflowListResponse.description: Schema for paginated workflow list response.

WorkflowResponse.title: WorkflowResponse
WorkflowResponse.description: Schema for Workflow response with steps.

WorkflowSummary.title: WorkflowSummary
WorkflowSummary.description: Summary schema for Workflow (without nested steps).
